title: Leaverbusted in a 4v5 or 3v5 game
body:
It is difficult to deal with this leaverbuster anymore. I get its intended point, but I still get like one in 5 games where somebody ragequits.

MEANWHILE it is like the 4th time I get a 5-game penalty in the last month and pretty much all of them have been technical. One of the previous one was over a game that loaded to 100% then for whatever reason the loader crashed and when I reloaded the game it took like 4 mins (old laptop). Oh, of course I got another game where I buy everything I go invade-fail and then walk to the bot tower, I type in chat that I should afk, and sit by the tower unmoved trying to snipe an unsuspecting enemy with the hook, only to get at 3 mins a remake vote. Guess what? I was tagged by the leaverbuster.

But the MOST INFURIATING one is the last one where some **dude DCed at around 7mins,** and then I took his lane **only to have another guy DC** slightly after 10. At that point I went to the fountain and alt-tabbed and waited for the 20 min vote. Guess what??? I got penalized for 5 games because I am supposed to click my mouse until 20 mins even if I have 2 afking teammates. 

Best part of all of this? Every batch of 5x20mins waits I got AT LEAST one ERROR FINDING GAME message, which you guessed it, forces another 20 min wait.

Please Riot, tell me HOW IS THE LEAVERBUSTER SUPPOSED TO WORK?

replies.body:
Regardless of intention, a disconnecting or going AFK in a match negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a key reason why disconnections are all treated equally and why penalties cannot be modified in any way.

The way the [Remake system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) specifically works is that any player who is *inactive* in the first 3 minutes of the game for 90 seconds or more will be marked by the system. At 3:00, if any player has been marked, a vote for a remake will begin and if passed, the player who caused the remake will receive a loss penalty.

To address the *error finding game* message, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as they commonly resolve the issue. Let me know if those steps caused any change.

What creates an "inactive" tag? Moving across the entire map is not enough to tag you as active?

And no, the guide never fixed any finding game error.

I can't give specifics regarding what does and doesn't negate an *inactive* mark since I don't want to encourage any skirting of the systems.

Since you're still having those errors, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you create a set of system logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it will give our techs more context on the issue.
Just out of curiosity; did Riot ever look into DOTA's leave forgiveness system as a possibility. And what made them choose remake system over that one.
